'''Flaming Flower Stamen''' is a [[Material]] found all over [[Teyvat]].

==How to Obtain==
Flaming Flower Stamens grow as [[Flaming Flower]]s, which are commonly found near grassy areas. Using a {{Hydro}} or {{Cryo}} attack on Flaming Flowers will extinguish them to become harvestable. While raining, Flaming Flowers are not extinguished by default. However, it is possible to cause a {{Hydro}} [[Swirl]] reaction on them under rain to extinguish them.

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=62 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

* There are two Flaming Flower Stamens heating the hilichurl cooking pot of the Meaty Tribe in [[Dadaupa Gorge]]. The flowers can be extinguished, though there is no effect on the pot.
